features: Eye-catching design - fuzzy geometic rug showcases a beautiful and bold line design, which is a geometry lover’s dream; The surface of the thick pile that hardly falls off is made of high-low flat weave with raised, cut patterns for a delightfully textured feel

Soft foot feel - Luxurious bedroom bedside rug embodies softness and comfort everywhere, which is mini spa for your toes; The middle of 0.3-inch memory foam not only provide extra cushioning for toddlers, but also provide a quiet habitat for sleeping kids

Excellent quality - Plush livingroom rug is sturdy and durable, does not fall off or sprout; Thousands of plastic anti-skid points at the bottom provide enough friction for the carpet, eliminating the need to bear additional carpet anti-skid pads while ensuring safety

Elegant decor - Shaggy textured rugs take your space to new heights, geometric print design beautifully enhances any room of the home, from the living room, bedroom, kids room, nursery, apartment dorm room, home theater, study, or home office

Care Instruction - Kids fuzzy rug is made of safe and stain resistant polyester fiber, recommended to vacuum regularly (without a beater bar); For a deeper clean, wipe the stain with mild soap and water or gently machine wash then air dry at room temperature

Reminder - The product is packaged in a vacuum sealed bag, After taking out the soft rug, please shake the carpet and stretch the edge of kids rug, the memory foam of the rugs will return to normal in 2-3 days. Or you can use a dryer to remove carpet wrinkles

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ompaa Memory Foam Rugs, Enjoy Your Life with Soft Shaggy rugs for living rooms can infuse your space with comfort and warmth. The luxurious feel of a shag rug can make any room feel more fancy. Get ready to slip off your shoes and bury your toes in the plush pile. Believe us, you'll love what Ompaa fluffy rugs can bring to your home.

Shaggy Geometric Modern Memory Foam Area Rugs

Care Instruction： Cleaning our extra soft area rug is a breeze. It can be machine washed separately with cold water or mild detergent without bleach. And you can also wash it by hand if needed, ensuring its longevity and pristine appearance. Warm Tips: In order to better protect this rug, we use vacuum packaging. If there are creases after receiving, please flip the carpet in the opposite direction and lay it flat for a period of time. Wrinkles usually flatten out within 2-3 days after unfolding.

Why does my rug look different than the photo ? Machine woven rugs may have slight variation in colors, sizes, patterns(up to 2% ) which are not considered defects. Due to different monitor resolutions and lighting you may notice a slight difference. My rug has a chemical odor. Is this normal ? Dyes, yarns, backing and packing material all have natural odors that are sometimes magnified after being sealed for shipping and storage. If desired, place the rug near an open window or fan for the first few hours to help air it out. How do I get rid of folded edges or creases in my rug ? Open your rug as soon as possible once it arrives. Then place the rug on the floor and pull gently on the edges to help smooth out any creases. Creases should disappear within a few days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Luxuriously Soft with Nice Cushion Rug
reviews.reviewText: I am shocked at the great quality of this rug, along with its beauty. What a value purchase. I bought it for my 2nd bedroom and it rocks the room. It so soft to step on yet has a nice cushion to it. As a bonus it is machine washable. I highly recommend this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rug for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this rug to replace an old shaggy rug that was under my gaming set up. This rug was PERFECT. I needed something pink, something soft but not super shaggy, just plush enough for my chair to still roll on. My gaming chair has no problem rolling on it, it vacuums very easily and it wasn’t at all wrinkled. Once I unfolded it it flattened out almost instantly. It’s really soft to the touch and I’m honestly impressed by the quality at the price point. I thought it would be more of a blanket thin rug but it’s not. It’s literally perfect and really pretty. The color was spot on but my picture is in low lighting so it might looks dull in the pic. But the rug itself was spot on and great for the price. I kind of want to buy other colors now …

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight rug
reviews.reviewText: This rug was perfect as a play spot for our infant kids. It has cushion but is light/flexible enough to be washed in a standard machine. There are grippy dots on the back to keep it from sliding. We’ve washed it a few times and it’s held up great with no shedding. We wash and dry on the bulky/comforter setting in cold water & low heat. Easy to spot clean with a rag too. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted, just one small issue
reviews.reviewText: This rug is exactly what I was looking for. A small area rug with a bit of padding, but NOT one of those ridiculous 3 inch faux fur rugs. I bought it for my bedroom to put beside the bed. Just the right size for my space. Very soft, and it looks really nice in person.I've only had it a few weeks so I can't speak to the durability, but it was only $20. I would probably buy another if it lasts for a reasonably decent period of time.The white sections especially show dirt really easily, but it's so small it's no problem to quickly run the vacuum over it, and thus far, that leaves it looking good as new again (and my vacuum is a very basic model without a brush, just for reference).Just one caveat: when I first took it out of the package, it had a VERY strong chemical smell. At first I was just going to leave it on the floor to air out while I ran some errands, but after a couple of minutes, I realized the smell was strong enough it was noticeable from the hallway. Yikes.Fortunately, I happened to receive it at the start of a sunny weekend, so I hung it over our deck railing and let it air out for two days. This did the trick. I probably would have been fine bringing it in after only one day, but since the weather was so nice, I left it longer just in case. I was very relieved that this worked, because as I said, it's exactly what I was looking for, and I haven't seen many similar to this design.However, I don't have kids. Due to how strong the smell was, I would hesitate before allowing babies or small children to play on it, as is shown in the pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: This rug is great. Please ignore clutter in my pic, I’m redoing our play area/living room/office. We had an old piece of carpet serving as a rug but it was getting gross so I went looking for something soft but with cushion. Also MUST be able to vacuum because my toddler and his buds are messy! The first rug I ordered was smaller than advertised and would suck up in the vacuum and was so thin. I packed it back up and tried this one. When I first opened it and unrolled it, I loved how soft it was but thought maybe it would be too small as well. It starts off a few inches too short in all directions. But I grabbed my vacuum and started sweeping out to all the sides and it does stretch out to the correct dimensions with some patience! Note I do turn the suction lower on my vacuum because it still is thinner than carpet, but it’s a good material and soft! I have some waterproof carpet pad underneath and it’s perfect. Definitely recommend this rug for toddler play areas! Bonus that it is machine washable as well :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice rug
reviews.reviewText: It fits perfectly under my full size bed. I got it for a little pop of color and to help with noise and it's doing both for me. Really soft and nice to walk on. Easy to clean too. I love it. My only suggestion would be getting those nonslip adhesives for the corners as the rug is very light weight and will move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great rug but smell is awful
reviews.reviewText: I saw other reviews mentioning the smell, but I decided to try it anyway because of the price and look. The smell after taking it out of the package is awful. Smells like straight chemicals. I had to let it air out in the garage for a whole day. Otherwise, it is a nice rug and looks great. Super soft and seems like it will hold up well.

reviews.reviewerName: Lucy and cool MitchLucy and cool Mitch
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: Rug is soft and pretty squishy. Nice to have for a play area on hard floors. I had to wash it first to make it lay flat but then it was good.
Me gustó mucho, solo falta que termine de desarrugarse… es genial y se ve muy bonita.De momento le doy 4 estrellas por que llega muy arrugada veremos con el tiempo.

The rug comes folded in a compact pkg and over the course of a few hours fluffs up. The rug is so plush. I love the way it feels and so does my dog. He sleeps on it instead of his bed. He was sick the other day and had a bad case diarrhea but I was able to clean it easily and thoroughly. Would recommend this product for anyone.
